sections.heading: Creation of Michigan Department of Lifelong Education, Advancement, and Potential (Mileap); Creation of the Office of Early Childhood Education, Office of Higher Education, and Office of Education Partnerships Within Mileap; Transfer of the Powers and Duties of the Michigan Office of Great Start by
sections.text: Creation of Michigan Department of Lifelong Education, Advancement, and Potential (Mileap); Creation of the Office of Early Childhood Education, Office of Higher Education, and Office of Education Partnerships Within Mileap; Transfer of the Powers and Duties of the Michigan Office of Great Start by Type Iii, and the Governor's Educator Advisory Council and the Michigan Prek-12 Literacy Commission From the Department of Education to Mileap by Type Ii.
